ovdesc.p: This table stores codewords for addition of codewords to the payment message.

desc.p: This field defines Additional codes/ texts associated with the outbound codeword.
This field defines the SWIFT tag containing the codeword.
This field refers to the message payment type supported by the Payment hub.

Contains all the override messages which the user agreed to during Input. During the validation of a transaction, the system may provide the user with a series of screen override messages to indicate an anomaly.
This field defines the number corresponding to the Processing Sequence Description that needs to be executed.
This field defines the number corresponding to the ProcessingSequenceNumber that needs to be executed.
Record Activation Code generated for the record by the payment's hub.
Possible values:
N - Not active
A - Active
H-YYYYMMDDHHMMSSsss - History. Where: YYYY - year, MM - month, DD - day, HH - hour, MM - minutes, SS - seconds and sss - miliseconds.
F - Future
C - Not active future
Validation Rules:
19 alphanumeric characters.
The value is not editable by the user.
This field represents the BIC of the Receiver Bank
Record Status Code generated for the record by the payments hub.
Possible values:
L - Live
U - Unapproved
R - Reversed
MF - Modified future
Validation Rules:
1 alphanumeric character.
The value is not editable by the user.
Specifies the date from which the record is considered active for payments processing.
Used for internal purpose. Value of this field determines values of fields, 'RAC' and 'RSC'
Possible values:
N - New
M - Modified
R - Reverse
This field can hold upto 1 alphanumeric character and the value is not editable by the user.
This field defines Currency of the payment transaction
Indicates the company ID for which the record is created.
Example : BNK,GB1
Validation Rules:
3 alphanumeric characters.
The value links to the field ‘CompanyID’ in PPT.COMPANY
Used for internal purpose.Holds the ID of the current live record of store table.
This field can hold upto 65 alphanumeric characters and the value is not editable by the user.
Specifies the date until which the record is considered active for payments processing.Post this date, the record will be set as Inactive by the payments hub.
Used for internal purpose.Holds the ID of the current live record of store table.
This field can hold upto 65 alphanumeric characters and the value is not editable by the user.
This field defines priority of the message.
Used for internal purpose. Holds the ID of the previous live record of store table.
This field can hold upto 65 alphanumeric characters and the value is not editable by the user.
This field defines codeword to be sent in the outgoing payment message.
This field defines Priority of Outbound Codeword for SWIFT OUT Module.
